actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 104 of the River and Harbor Act of 1958 for the purpose of making such section apply to the water week hydrilla.

summary.text: Amends the River and Harbor Act of 1958 to include the water weed hydrilla in the water weed control and eradication program authorized under such Act

titles.title: A bill to amend section 104 of the River and Harbor Act of 1958 for the purpose of making such section apply to the water week hydrilla.
